nodes.title: Get & Set Node Searching
widgets_values:
## Nodes Map Search (Shift+m)

🚨🚨🚨🚨
Only available if you have "ComfyUI-Easy-Use" custom nodes installed. 
🚨🚨🚨🚨

In your Comfyui Interface panel. Usually on the left. Look for an icon with 1 small square on top and 3 small squares below it. It's call Nodes Map. 

---

Let say you see a "Set_FrameNum" node.

And you want to know where the "Get_FrameNum" is.

Enter in the search bar (Search by Node ID/Name...).
> Get_FramN....


--! Case Sensitive !--

And you will see it filtered.

Double click on that and it will bring you to the node.

---
Likewise for Get nodes.

"Set_FrameNum"

Search: 
>Get_FrameNum

Double click.

nodes.title: Known Errors:
widgets_values:
When you encountered this error:

> KSamplerAdvanced Expected all tensors to be on the same device, but found at least two devices, cpu and cuda:0! (when checking argument for argument mat1 in method wrapper_CUDA_addmm)

Disable/Delete BlockSwap and VRAM-Cleanup nodes.

Ensure you have enough VRAM.

@damiang

nodes.title: Color Match
widgets_values:
Reinhard seems to be better at realistic images.

You can try others.
Haven't done extensive research into this.


----

My Default:

>Method: Reinhard

>Strength: 0.5

---
Useful when using last frame to generate sequence videos.

nodes.title: Block Swap Settings
widgets_values:
Enable if you have VRAM issues, Up to MAX 40.

Turn on everything.

14B Models have Max 40 Blocks.

If you have no VRAM issues.
Disable it.

🡻🡻🡻

nodes.title: NAG
widgets_values:
Helps to refines video generation, especially with negative prompts, to improve consistency and quality when using CFG 1.

I think the default settings are good enough.

This only work with single sampler using CFG of 1.

nodes.title: Negative Prompt
widgets_values:
bright colors, overexposed, blurred details, subtitles, style, artwork, painting, picture, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, incomplete, extra fingers, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn faces, deformed, disfigured, malformed limbs, fused fingers, cluttered background, three legs, many people in the background, walking backwards,

talking, bad anatomy, downsampling, aliasing, distorted, blurry, glossy, blur, jpeg artifacts, compression artifacts, poorly drawn, low-resolution, bad, distortion, bad eyes, blurry eyes, motion blur, badly drawn eyes,

nodes.title: 🚨Torch Compile
widgets_values:
Only enable if you are able to use 

Otherwise set it to disable.


---


Need model pass connect at the end for WF to work if Torch Compile is disable.

nodes.title: 🚨 SAGE ATTENTION #
widgets_values:
🚨 Turn on Sage Attention if you have it installed. 

This is what I normally use:
>sageattn_qk_int8_pv_fp16_triton

nodes.title: VRAM-CleanUp
widgets_values: You can swap this node with other VRAM clean up management nodes you prefer.

nodes.title: Scale by
widgets_values:
Scale by Width and keep proportion.

Generally use when down scaling input Image.

Or just put the same width as your image to keep it the same.

Best use dimension with multiple of 16 or it will be crop.

Example:
>Image: 720 x 960
\
Input width: 480
\
Input Height: 10000
\
Result Video: 480 x 640

>Image: 720 x 1280
\
Input width: 640
\
Input Height: 10000
\
Result Video: 640 x 1136

nodes.title: CFG / Shift / Steps
widgets_values:
CFG = 1 (Using Self Forcing lora)
\
\
Shift = 8-4
\
\
Steps = 4-8 (higher steps higher quality but longer time to gen)

nodes.title: Scheduler & Sampler
widgets_values:
Default settings:
---
Single KSampler:

>Sampler:   lcm
\
Scheduler:  simple

---

You can try others if you want to experiment.

nodes.title: 🚨Loras Link - Important
widgets_values:
## Self Forcing Lora (Strength: 1):

Choose one:

[Link](https://civitai.com/models/1585622?modelVersionId=2014449) (707MB)

[Link](https://civitai.com/models/1585622?modelVersionId=2016546) (1.36GB) - Slightly better quality but bigger file size


🚨Require!

----

## Extra Enhancement (Optional):

Realism Boost (0.5):
[Link](https://huggingface.co/vrgamedevgirl84/Wan14BT2VFusioniX/blob/main/OtherLoRa's/Wan14B_RealismBoost.safetensors) ( 307MB)
\
(This might affect some loras, might want to toggle this off 1st)

Detail Enhancer (0.5): 
[Link](https://huggingface.co/vrgamedevgirl84/Wan14BT2VFusioniX/blob/main/OtherLoRa's/DetailEnhancerV1.safetensors) ( 307MB)

Credits to [vrgamedevgirl](https://civitai.com/user/vrgamedevgirl)

---
MPS Reward Lora  (0.4-0.5):
[Link](https://huggingface.co/alibaba-pai/Wan2.1-Fun-Reward-LoRAs/blob/main/Wan2.1-Fun-14B-InP-MPS.safetensors)  (1.46GB)

----
Put in 1st Lora Loaders (Purple) as you will use this often. And you won't get mixed up with other Loras for diff vids.

You can toggle the extra off if they affect the outcome too much.

🗂️: models/loras

🡻🡻🡻

nodes.title: GGUF Clip Connection
widgets_values:
🡹🚩Connect your GGUF Clip Here 

🢀 Disable the Native one if you are using GGUF

nodes.title: Speed
widgets_values:
## Speed input:

>1 = normal speed

>more than 1 = accelerated motion but reduce video length

>Less than 1 = slow down motion but increase video length

-----
Try not go below 0.6 speed.

nodes.title: Frame Interpolation
widgets_values:
## If you wish to use external Frame Interpolation + Upscaler. 

>Set Interpolation Multiplier to 1.
\
Set Speed to 1.
\
Switch off Upscaler
\
Switch on First Pass

----------------
Otherwise,

>2-3 Interpolation Multiplier for accelerated videos

>4-5 Interpolation Multiplier for slow down videos

> 2-4 Interpolation Multiplier for normal speed videos

nodes.title: Color Match
widgets_values:
Usually use for sequencing video from last frame to have consistent color.

Can also use if you want color to be uniform through out the video, especially in some cases where color of the vid get gradually more saturated/bright.

nodes.title: First Pass
widgets_values:
Disable to skip the 1st video combine.

Use when you want to upscale but don't want to have the un-scale video.

nodes.title: Save Last Frame
widgets_values: Save the last frame of the video so you can generate sequence video using that last frame and then join them together later.

nodes.title: GGUF Model Connection
widgets_values:
🡹🚩Connect your GGUF Diffusion Model Here 

🢀 Disable the Native one if you are using GGU
